  sgcool_label_text: This pink baju panjang is embellished with large hibiscus motifs. Baju panjangs are hip or knee length long tunics with v-shaped openings. Silk baju panjangs were worn by Peranakan brides on the twelfth day of the traditional Peranakan wedding ceremony. In the late nineteenth century
 Peranakan women wore batik baju panjang in subdued shades. In the 1920s
 chemical dyes introduced a range of colours
 producing colourful baju panjangs. The baju panjang remained fashionable for young girls in Penang and Malacca up until the first decade of the twentieth century
 when the far more form-fitting

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This pink baju panjang is embellished with large hibiscus motifs. Baju panjangs are hip or knee length long tunics with v-shaped openings. Silk baju panjangs were worn by Peranakan brides on the twelfth day of the traditional Peranakan wedding ceremony. In the late nineteenth century, Peranakan women wore batik baju panjang in subdued shades. In the 1920s, chemical dyes introduced a range of colours, producing colourful baju panjangs. The baju panjang remained fashionable for young girls in Penang and Malacca up until the first decade of the twentieth century, when the far more form-fitting
